author: senh
title: Best U.S. seaside escapes
text: BING NEWS: U.S., Cuba Reach Agreement to Establish Full Diplomatic Relations The U.S. Embassy building, constructed in 1953 and occupying a prominent place by the Malecón, the famous seaside drive, has been a focus for tensions between the two countries, and a rallying point for the Cuban regime, which habitually called it a ... 06/30/2015 - 5:22 pm | View Link Pacific Grove named in "Best U.S. Seaside Escapes" by CNN PG was added to the list alongside Mystic, Connecticut, Nantucket, Massachusetts, Ogunquit, Maine, and Watch Hill, Rhode Island. CNN said PG is the perfect spot for people looking for a hometown hideaway. Point Pinos Lighthouse is named as an attraction ... 06/30/2015 - 8:54 am | View Link Summer hideaways: Best U.S. seaside escapes (CNN)Drowsy port towns aren't trying to make it big. They're content to sit quietly idle without the throngs of trend-seekers in search of a place to deem the next hotspot. That's why we like them.
